Specifications

  • 1GB Dedicated RAM
  • 1 CPU core Ryzen 3900x
  • 15GB NVME Disk
  • FREE 3TB Additional Disk
  • 10TB/Month @ 1Gbps Shared (Previously 5TB only)
  • 1 x IPv4
  • Private Internal IP
  • Location: New Jersey
  • $7/m

Special

First 5 orders get 20% more discount!! - use promo code 20off

Terms

  • 20% off is for monthly payment only

  • Bandwidth capped the connection speed to 10Mbit when bandwidth exceeded.

  • Setup can be 30th November or 1 December. There is few hard drives in the way but due thanksgiving it a bit delayed.
